name: Exile Island
description:
Exile Island

This is an initial prototype for a first person adventure game. You can explore the island but there are currently no puzzles or objectives.  For this release I've focused on first person controls, directional sound and visual aesthetics. I also spent time on improving WebGL performance. If you do play this prototype I would love to know at what quality setting you're able to achieve 60fps. I am able to get 60fps at 75% quality without a 3D graphics card and 100% quality with the 3D card enabled. You can get the frame rate by pressing the spacebar in-game.

Controls

          Enter : Settings Menu
          Escape : Exit Fullscreen
          WASD : Movement
          Mouse : Look Around

Credits

          Art : Luis Fernandez (luyssport.artstation.com)
          Music : Benjamin Burnes (abstractionmusic.com)
